# defaultDirectoryURL

**Type Property**

The location of the directory that contains the persistent stores.

## Declaration

```swift
class var defaultDirectoryURL: URL { get }
```

## Accessing the Default Directory

- **defaultDirectoryURL()**: Returns the location of the directory that contains the persistent stores.
